title: MPCA MATERIALS FROM SENIORS / EC branch PPL
content:
Do any of the seniors have a good functional materials mentioned below pls dm me 

List Of Materials:-   
1. Arduino UNO (**R3 CH340G+MEGA328P Chip 16Mhz For Arduino UNO R3 Development board**)

2. HC-SR04 Ultrasonic Sensor

3. Jumper Wires(around 20-25 wires )  
4. DC Buzzer (**5V active buzzer Electromagnetic**)  


[One set UNO R3 CH340G+MEGA328P Chip 16Mhz For Arduino UNO R3 Development board](https://preview.redd.it/e456t1kfq7qe1.png?width=534&format=png&auto=webp&s=5257f80b7d1a4a61b4874022b4be9f35dd44633a)

[HC-SR04 Ultrasonic Sensor](https://preview.redd.it/3rxwddnxq7qe1.png?width=215&format=png&auto=webp&s=42a3b99a961649c2d46c808564132afc87f55926)

[5V active buzzer Electromagnetic \(SOT plastic tube length acoustic \)](https://preview.redd.it/ilgj2esbr7qe1.png?width=407&format=png&auto=webp&s=f9e217b08539beb540f2d0eadc2d6912e29ead84)

[Dupont Line 20CM 40Pin Male to Male + Male to Female and Female to Female Jumper Wire Dupont Cable](https://preview.redd.it/wemxwzthr7qe1.png?width=551&format=png&auto=webp&s=7bd5cd80bc8edf678d2d15bab74e26e69e4f6448)



tks alot guys   
<I really don't wish to buy online n honestly i haven't worked on these b4 so i'm a complete beginner & i'm not sure the quality and functional checking procedure i'll return them back after demo >
